urls.title: Baggage allowance and information - Etihad Airways
urls.description: Travelling light, taking your surfboard or need to add extra bags? Find out everything you need to know about getting your baggage to where you want to go.

data.text:
@Sharaddate1988 Hi Sharad, as per law one bag must not weigh more than 32kg, this is a strict restriction imposed internationally for safety reasons. The information is also mentioned on our website for your reference. *Vio
https://t.co/RwC1ozsUns
